text: Canouan is a island in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. The island is only about 3.5 miles by 1.25 miles. It is located at the south of St. Vincent. Canouan also has an airport called the, Canouan Airport. ==Other websites== *Canouan island's Official website Category:Geography of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Category:Caribbean islands
title: Canouan
